title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
OB: When attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset, an error is displayed instead of the expected behavior of showing the group dialog.
EB: As per the template requirements, the UI should not perform any validation and should show the group dialog even when the dataset is not set.
SR: To reproduce the issue: Add a table report item without setting the dataset and try creating a new table group.
